data.title: New York's largest indoor and outdoor bar
data.meta_description: Igloo rooftop bar , Rooftop bar in Flatiron
data.meta_site_name: Rooftop Bar NYC - New York's largest indoor and outdoor bar
data.text:
Located in the heart of New York City, Flatiron district a few blocks from the Empire State Building. 230 Fifth Rooftop offers a unique and relaxed atmosphere for patrons to unwind and enjoy breathtaking views. As a year-round destination, guests can experience the best of both worlds with both indoor and outdoor spaces available for their enjoyment.

We believe in spontaneity and welcome guests to drop in at their leisure. With no reservations required, you can simply come as you are and immerse yourself in the vibrant ambiance.

Step outside and experience the magic of our outdoor area.

For those seeking a more exclusive experience, we offer private rooms that cater to intimate gatherings and special occasions. Whether it’s a birthday celebration, corporate event, or romantic rendezvous, our dedicated spaces provide the perfect backdrop for memorable moments shared with loved ones.

Join us and discover why we’re renowned for offering not just a bar, but an experience unlike any other.

Experience New York City’s premier all season rooftop destination, boasting the title of the city’s largest rooftop space. With a relaxed atmosphere, it’s the perfect spot to unwind and take in breathtaking views of the iconic skyline. While primarily known as a bar, we also take pride in our diverse menu of delicious food options. Whether you’re stopping by for a casual drink or a satisfying meal, you’ll find yourself in a smart casual environment that’s both welcoming and stylish. Come experience the magic of 230 Fifth and elevate your New York City experience.

Offering multiple indoor and outdoor bars and event spaces , live DJ’s , themed events,

Again walk ins are encouraged !

At 230 Fifth , we’re dedicated to creating unforgettable experiences tailored to your unique vision.

With 33,000 square feet of multi-purpose space, you can choose from a variety of indoor and outdoor spaces to suit your event needs. Offering full event planning , catering, advanced audiovisual services and more.

Whether you’re planning a corporate gathering, wedding celebration, or social soirée, birthday party , bat / bar mitzvah, our full-service offerings ensure every detail is meticulously curated to exceed your expectations.

Whether you prefer the intimate ambiance of a private room or the open-air allure of our outdoor terrace, we have the perfect setting to bring your vision to life. Our semi-private areas offer a balance of exclusivity and accessibility, ideal for gatherings of all sizes..

Experience the difference of 230 Fifth Private Events and elevate your next event to new heights. Contact us today to begin planning your unforgettable occasion.
